Double inverted pendulum controller...

    http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=thnHbKfAUAE

I did see controllers that kept the pole more or less perfectly
straight, but like most controllers I encountered they were very
senstive to any external forces, and as such would have made for a
very boring video.

Colin.
